extends AbstractSelfExcitingProcess

        public Vector Λ​()
        The random variable defined by 1-exp(-ξ(i)-ξ(i-1)) indicates a better fit the more uniformly distributed it is.

      • Λ

        protected double Λ​(int i)
        n-th compensated point
        Parameters:
        i - >= 1 and <= n
        Returns:
        sum(k -> iψ(T.get(i + 1) - T.get(k)) - iψ(T.get(i) - T.get(k)), 0, i-1)
